tool_description: Analyzes product catalog data to categorize products, identify pricing tiers, and assess promotional suitability based on various attributes and historical performance.

catalog_data_source.description: Path or identifier for the product catalog data source

error_messages: Invalid catalog data source: Ensure the catalog data source path or identifier is valid and accessible.
Invalid price range: price_range_min must be less than price_range_max and both must be positive numbers.
Empty category filter: At least one valid category must be specified if category_filter is provided.
Catalog parsing error: The catalog data format is not supported or corrupted.
usage: Provide catalog_data_source to analyze all products, or use optional filters to focus on specific categories or price ranges. The tool returns categorized product data with pricing insights.

pricing_tiers.description: Identified pricing tiers (e.g., budget, mid-range, premium)

promotional_readiness.description: Product IDs suitable for promotional pricing

average_margin.description: Average profit margin across analyzed products
